content: > full of texture bobbles and knit-like stitching this warm winter throw is the ultimate in comfort and style the various stitch patterns will keep your attention as you make it and the super bulky yarn lends to a quick project cuddle up under the squishiest boho inspired winter blanket you ve ever made optional border and tassels also available as an ad-free pdf on etsy 1 1 https //www etsy com/listing/732572336/wintertide-throw-blanket-crochet-pattern ref=shop_home_active_1
